ValidationRule.description:
This rule prevents anyone except System Admins & the Jamaica Sales Ops team from reopening closed won or billed opportunities
****Any modification to this rule without approval will result in suspension of your salesforce account.****
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
CASE( StageName , "Prospecting & Qualification",1, "Solution Design",1, "Commercial Review",1, "Proposal Review",1, "Proposal Acceptance",1, "Closed Won",1, "Billed",3, "Disconnected",4, "Closed Lost",5,0) < CASE(PRIORVALUE(StageName) , "Prospecting & Qualification",1, "Solution Design",1, "Commercial Review",1, "Proposal Review",1, "Proposal Acceptance",1, "Closed Won",1, "Billed",3, "Disconnected",4, "Closed Lost",5,0)
&&( RecordType.Name = "Digicel Business Opportunity" || RecordType.Name = "IDOM IO ICT" || RecordType.Name = "IDOM FWI ICT" )
&& $Profile.Name <>"System Admin Jr" && $Profile.Name <>"System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <>"Group Business Solutions" && $Profile.Name <>"Jamaica - ICT/GSM Power User" && $Profile.Name <>"Bermuda ICT&GSM - Power User" && $Profile.Name <>"Barbados ICT - Manager" && $Profile.Name <>"Trinidad ICT&GSM - Power User" && $Profile.Name <>"Trinidad Sales Manager (DealHub) DS" && $Profile.Name <>"Digicel PNG Sales Operations" && $Profile.Name <>"PNG - Sales Executive" && $Profile.Name <>"PNG - Sales Manager" && $Profile.Name <>"DBS Power User" && $Profile.Name <>"DBS Power User - Dealhub Pilot" && $Profile.Name <>"Jamaica - ICT/GSM Power User - Dealhub Pilot" && $Profile.Name <>"FWI DBS Standard User - Dealhub Pilot"
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
Your attempt to revert the stage of a closed opportunity is not allowed. If you need a new opportunity you can create a clone of this record using the "Clone" button
Closed Opportunities are not allowed to be reopened regardless if they are Lost or Won
